g.text: (0-5, start at 5 except Fortune which starts at 0)
Starts at 5 - At 0: Resist the Forest
PRESS ON: Spend 1 Fortune to push Dire to BrightHOLD BACK: Accept Bright instead of Radiant to restore 1 Fortune
Items, bonds, wounds, clues, debts, and other important notes

svg.text: Draw+Score - Radiant (beat both) - Bright (beat one) - Dire (beat neither)
